Oh! That reminds me. There are some problems about Vukodlak that I 
need to talk to you about, Dachande.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Dachande/Battera/Vukodlak::
> 
>     Dachande and Battera were summoned to the Destron base, the 
Sulaco. "Vulois, we have been summoned, I cannot refuse this, I will 
attempt to make Magma let his bond to me go, but I doubt it will 
work."
>     Battera and Dachande left, on the way, Battera, and Battera 
only was sucked under the earth. Dachande was in a frantic, he was 
blasting at the ground with all of his weapons, but it did no good. 
He couldn't get her, so he used his spear to try and dig, needless to 
say he wasn't sucessful.
> 
>     Battera fell into the cave of Vukodlak. She caught herself on 
her wings, and coasted to the ground. Unfortunatly her will was not 
as strong as others, she could not resist Vukodlak's lure, there was 
not even any resistance. She went and partook of his mech fluid. It 
gave her enhanced abilities, and made her somewhat eviler. She then 
burst from the ground ten feet from Dachande, and took off without 
Dachande, he went to beast mode, as it were his faster form of 
travel, but he was still losing yards to her.
